long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ContactBook - Contact Extractor

Effortlessly manage and organize your contacts with the ContactBook Contact Extractor. This powerful Chrome extension allows you to quickly extract, categorize, and share contacts from various sources like Gmail, LinkedIn, Twitter, Instagram, and moreâ€”all within a few clicks. 

Key Features:

Easy Contact Extraction: Seamlessly extract contacts from emails, social networks, and other platforms directly into your ContactBook.

Phone Number to Company Details: Convert phone numbers into actionable company details directly from Gmail, LinkedIn, Twitter, Instagram, and more.

Customizable Tags: Organize your contacts with custom tags for easier search and filtering.

Team Collaboration: Share contacts with your team instantly, ensuring everyone stays on the same page.

Google Sync: Automatically sync your extracted contacts with Google Contacts, keeping everything up-to-date.

Perfect for professionals and teams looking to streamline their contact management process. Start organizing your contacts like a pro with ContactBook Contact Extractor!
